text:
@BorisJohnson On 14 April, a time when 000s of people were suffering/dying in the biggest public health crisis in a century, with shortages of PPE and testing, your chief advisor faked a backdated entry in his blog to make it look like he predicted the coronavirus.

SHAMEFUL. INDEFENSIBLE.
